column5: Wonderful Townhouse on the Island. Fully upgraded with exquisite granite throughout. I have a barbeque, home gym and other fancy furnishings. This is my home so I try to keep it nice! Do some fishing off the private dock and feel free to use the kayak if you like. House is located walking distance from Schlitterbahn in a highly desirable area of the Island.
column8: Upgraded Waterfront Home w/ Dock and Home Gym
